allow:
Bash(__NEW_LINE__ sqlite3 "$DB_PATH" "
SELECT ''=== All DELETE operations on travel_info ==='' as header;

SELECT 
  datetime(timestamp, ''localtime'') as time,
  action,
  record_id,
  details
FROM audit_log
WHERE table_name = ''travel_info'' AND action = ''DELETE''
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 50;
")

Bash(__NEW_LINE__ sqlite3 "$DB_PATH" "
SELECT ''=== Last 10 operations on mh9pqhp5fziejfhtta7 ==='' as header;

SELECT 
  datetime(timestamp, ''localtime'') as time,
  action,
  table_name,
  record_id
FROM audit_log
WHERE record_id = ''mh9pqhp5fziejfhtta7''
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT '''' as separator;
SELECT ''=== First operation on new record mhct8mp7ji2ip9d56bs ==='' as header;

SELECT 
  datetime(timestamp, ''localtime'') as time,
  action,
  table_name,
  record_id
FROM audit_log
WHERE record_id = ''mhct8mp7ji2ip9d56bs''
ORDER BY timestamp ASC
LIMIT 5;
")
